storyInfo: Leonhardt tells his friends about his 'heroic exploits,' helping people escape the fangs of an evil mine owner and bringing them home.

attributes.content: Negative in zones E31 and E32. Possible positive in zone 30...
attributes.name: Tired Miner

attributes.content: Hey, are you okay?
attributes.name: Timid Miner

attributes.content: I'm fine, just a little dizzy...
attributes.name: Tired Miner

attributes.content: Let me guess, fatigue?
attributes.name: Angry Miner

attributes.content: That bloody Cowell thinks we're burdenbeasts.
attributes.name: Angry Miner

attributes.content: There are so many of us here. We should be burying our pickaxes in his skull, not these rocks!
attributes.name: Angry Miner

attributes.content: Shh! Not so loud. His men are nearby.
attributes.name: Timid Miner

attributes.content: Who knows what they might do if they hear you?
attributes.name: Timid Miner

attributes.content: Yeah, it's okay... don't worry about me. I can take it...
attributes.name: Tired Miner

attributes.content: Let me handle it. You take a break, see if Leonhardt needs anything.
attributes.name: Cruise Jr.

attributes.content: That Catastrophe Messenger has it easy!
attributes.name: Angry Miner

attributes.content: It's his fault that we got kidnapped and taken here in the first place!
attributes.name: Angry Miner

attributes.content: Hey! What are you doing? Slacking off?
attributes.name: Mine Guard

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Tired Miner

attributes.content: But what? Know your place.
attributes.name: Mine Guard

attributes.content: You're hostages!
attributes.name: Mine Guard

attributes.content: Hey now, take it easy.
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: Put yourself in his shoes. What's left of them, anyway...
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: Imagine if you were a miner who got packed into a crate like ore, dragged to this dangerous Catastrophe zone, and made to bang on rocks without rest.
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: It's exhausting just thinking about it, am I right? Like, just saying it made me feel so tired I can hardly talk anymore...
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: So why not let them have a little break, my good man? I'm sure they'll work even harder afterwards.
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: Or, say, maybe we could do it this way. I'll go look for veins, and if I find something, we could get the miners toâ€”
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: That's enough out of you, brat.
attributes.name: Mine Guard

attributes.content: There's only a small window when the veins are exposed after a Catastrophe. Timing is everything in the competition for mining rights.
attributes.name: Mine Guard

attributes.content: Don't think I don't know what you're thinking. You want to sit on your thumbs until Maize Drill sends a rescue and steals what we know about the veins!
attributes.name: Mine Guard

attributes.content: Wait, wasn't it Cowell who kidnapped you all? Why would the miners blame you?
attributes.name: Honeyberry

attributes.content: Eh, learning to deal with people getting upset is like Catastrophe Messenger 101.
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: And hey, I couldn't persuade the guards, so... I get it. Perfectly understandable.
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: But hadn't you been helping them, mate?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Well, not for very long, I hadn't... Maybe they'd have listened to Cruise Jr.
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: Hey, now there's a familiar name.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Wasn't he the one who sent you a thank-you letter? The one you read to us?
attributes.name: Honeyberry

attributes.content: Oh? Ahaha... did I read his letter to you guys?
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: You did. I remember.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Ah... I thought I only read it to the girls at Medical...
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: Well, it wasn't just his letter. There were many others. I can see how you'd forget which ones you'd read.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: So, why do you keep bringing up this Cruise Jr.? Was he the real culprit behind the scenes?
attributes.name: Honeyberry

attributes.content: Hm? That can't be right. He sounded to me like the kinda guy you can count on.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: In terms of narrative, someone in his position isn't necessarily the antagonist. He could also have a positive influence on the protagonist's actions.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: All we can infer from what we know is that he played an important role in this event.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Hey, what's with all this attention on Cruise Jr.? This is about MY heroic exploits!
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: Hey, is that... Ayers!
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: Ayers! Over here!
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: Stop shouting, Leon.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: I knew you were here. I could hear you babbling about your 'heroic exploits' from the cafeteria entrance.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Cowell would have cut your head off if you were half as noisy when you were kidnapped.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Cowell? Wait, so the story is true?
attributes.name: Honeyberry

attributes.content: ...Parts of it, maybe? I haven't heard this version yet.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: You can take my seat then. I need to return a book to Sonya.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Well then, Kroos and I will also...
attributes.name: Honeyberry

attributes.content: Hey, don't go! I'm not finished!
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: What do you need, sir?
attributes.name: Tired Miner

attributes.content: Huh? Ah, just hold these for me. You can sit down over there, take a break. Oh, and check if there are any notable cracks on the walls while you're at it.
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: Take a break? So you overheard us talking...
attributes.name: Tired Miner

attributes.content: Yeah, I did. No need to worry about my feelings though, we Catastrophe Messengers are tougher than we look. Mm-hmm.
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: If Cowell's men ask, I made you do this.
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: So take a break. Keep that up, and your lungs will only get worse.
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: Thank you, sir.
attributes.name: Tired Miner

attributes.content: All my years of hardship would it worth it, if the young folks of Rim Billiton all grow up like you.
attributes.name: Tired Miner

attributes.content: And Ayerscarpe... he can be aloof, but there's something about him that's different from the other guards.
attributes.name: Tired Miner

attributes.content: When I fell behind earlier... he saw through how sick I was and helped me carry my stuff.
attributes.name: Tired Miner

attributes.content: My lungs have been giving out for a few years now, but mining is the only thing I know...
attributes.name: Tired Miner

attributes.content: I haven't told anyone except Cruise Jr. Didn't want to be seen as useless.
attributes.name: Tired Miner

attributes.content: Well... Ayers and I grew up together on a mining ship.
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: So how should I put it...
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: I managed to grab this before Cowell burned our camp. Have you seen it before?
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: This is... did it belong to Ayerscarpe?
attributes.name: Tired Miner

attributes.content: Yeah, he puts his edamame inside.
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: Edamame?
attributes.name: Tired Miner

attributes.content: Hilarious, isn't it? He looks so tough, but he has such a soft spot for the stuff.
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: When we were little, we knew an old man around the mines who had a lung disease.
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: He sold snacks next to the mine because he couldn't go in anymore. Grease and smoke were too much for him too, so he made stuff like salt-boiled edamame.
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: And he always gave kids like us extra.
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: Only when we grew up did we learn how little he made.
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: So for me and Ayers, miners are kind of like family... well, close neighbors, at least.
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: Leonhardt...
attributes.name: Tired Miner

attributes.content: L-Leonhardt! Are you there?
attributes.name: Timid Miner

attributes.content: Hm? What's wrong?
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: Cowell's men are taking Luca away! Cruise is trying to stop them!
attributes.name: Timid Miner

attributes.content: Wait, there's a new character? Who's this Luca?
attributes.name: Honeyberry

attributes.content: It's gotta be that 'Angry Miner' guy from before, right?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Oh, you mean the guards overheard the miners talking?
attributes.name: Honeyberry

attributes.content: Well, I don't know the full picture... All I know is that Cowell's men had Cruise Jr. surrounded and were beating him up when I arrived.
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: Because he wouldn't let them take Luca away?
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Cowell wanted to make an example of him. Show what happens to people who speak up.
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: Thank you for saving me... even after all I said about you...
attributes.name: Luca

attributes.content: No worries. Cowell wouldn't exactly refuse to trade a miner for a new ore deposit.
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: Cruise Jr. is the one you should thank. He put himself on the line for you, against so many burly guys too.
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: You're right...
attributes.name: Luca

attributes.content: So... how is he?
attributes.name: Luca

attributes.content: Still out cold.
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: He has a broken arm and quite a few bumps and bruises, but no harm to any vital organs, fortunately.
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: Damn it... that bastard Cowell and his goons...
attributes.name: Luca

attributes.content: Please, Luca! Just keep your head down, and we might see daylight again...
attributes.name: Timid Miner

attributes.content: Get on Cowell's bad side, and we're all dead men walking!
attributes.name: Timid Miner

attributes.content: I heard Cowell has a female bodyguard...
attributes.name: Timid Miner

attributes.content: Former assassin. Real nasty stuff... There was a young entrepreneur who got into a bidding war with him at an auction.
attributes.name: Timid Miner

attributes.content: The bodyguard cut the guy's arms off. In front of everyone.
attributes.name: Timid Miner

attributes.content: Why would someone like that take orders from a man like Cowell?
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: Apparently, she has friends and family working for Cowell Mining... He must be holding them hostage.
attributes.name: Timid Miner

attributes.content: He's pretty paranoid and likes to keep a firm grasp on his subordinates. The mine guards are probably the same.
attributes.name: Timid Miner

attributes.content: But I haven't seen any female subordinates around him... strange.
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: ...Maybe she's watching us from the shadows.
attributes.name: Timid Miner

attributes.content: I would've said you were full of shit, if I hadn't seen Ayerscarpe in action.
attributes.name: Luca

attributes.content: After seeing him fight a whole regiment, though... I wouldn't be surprised if Cowell had someone like that under his command.
attributes.name: Luca

attributes.content: Who knows which of 'em would have the upper hand if they came face-to-face... but I'm guessing a former assassin knows some dirty tricks.
attributes.name: Timid Miner

attributes.content: You give me too little credit, Leon.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: But that's checkmate isn't it?
attributes.name: Honeyberry

attributes.content: If it's someone not even Ayerscarpe can handle...
attributes.name: Honeyberry

attributes.content: Wouldn't you be stuck in that mine at Cowell's mercy?
attributes.name: Honeyberry

attributes.content: Let's see how the protagonist gets out of this predicament.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Well, that's not the important part... the bodyguard was a ghost who never even appeared. But I made an even more shocking discovery in the mines...
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: What was it?
attributes.name: Honeyberry

attributes.content: Explosives.
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: Cowell was waiting for Maize Drill to send rescue, then he'd blow us all up together.
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: Maybe you could have dealt with the guards, Ayers, but could you stop an explosion?
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: Tch.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Er...
attributes.name: Honeyberry

attributes.content: This is getting a little scary...
attributes.name: Honeyberry

attributes.content: Zzz... zzz...
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Kroos...
attributes.name: Honeyberry

attributes.content: Kroos?
attributes.name: Honeyberry

attributes.content: She dozed off.
attributes.name: Honeyberry

attributes.content: Let her sleep. I feel it's going to be a while before we get to the good part.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Hey, are you implying that wasn't a good part?
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: An unarmed miner, bravely making a stand against the evil mine owner and his hired muscle!
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: Inspired by his act of courage, the Catastrophe Messenger heads towards a showdown with the villain!
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: (Yawns)
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Did you just... yawn at me? I sure hope that was the fun kind of yawn.
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: Oh, sorry, couldn't resist... I must have eaten a little too much...
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Ha.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Let them off the hook, Leon.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Isn't tormenting me enough?
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: So, how did you propose to deal with the explosives, Leonhardt?
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: He caused a massive explosion.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Hey, spoilers! We're not there yet! Good storytelling is about the journey!
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: So, this is where the detonation switch should be...
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: Number 26. Any more in this area...?
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: Leonhardt...
attributes.name: Cruise Jr.

attributes.content: Oh, you're awake! Does it hurt anywhere?
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: I'm much better. It's just the arm... There's no need to do all this for me, Leonhardt.
attributes.name: Cruise Jr.

attributes.content: Stay put. You have a broken forearm.
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: ...What're those?
attributes.name: Cruise Jr.

attributes.content: Oh? Well... these are transmitters I use to detect Catastrophe movement.
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: I used to be an engineer in the army. Those are explosives, aren't they?
attributes.name: Cruise Jr.

attributes.content: Did Cowell do this?
attributes.name: Cruise Jr.

attributes.content: Most likely. There must be seventy, eighty bundles in this hole. Enough to flip this entire place upside down, and us along with it.
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: Good thing they're not the type that explode on contact...
attributes.name: Cruise Jr.

attributes.content: I can help. I've defused explosives before.
attributes.name: Cruise Jr.

attributes.content: Not with that arm you can't. There are better ways to be a tough guy.
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: Look.
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: ...Originium Arts?
attributes.name: Cruise Jr.

attributes.content: I can't believe you destroyed the detonators with such precision from such a distance.
attributes.name: Cruise Jr.

attributes.content: Completely undetectable, too. No alarms raised.
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: But it's all over if they see you fiddling around down here and decide to press the BOOM button.
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: Head back and join up with the rest. The company will send rescue soon.
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Cruise Jr.

attributes.content: Leonhardt...
attributes.name: Cruise Jr.

attributes.content: Will the company really send help?
attributes.name: Cruise Jr.

attributes.content: Most of us are on short-term contracts with Maize Drill.
attributes.name: Cruise Jr.

attributes.content: No one expected this, the whole Catastrophe and vicious competition between corporations...
attributes.name: Cruise Jr.

attributes.content: To tell you the truth, though... most of us in this group are still owed wages.
attributes.name: Cruise Jr.

attributes.content: The workers disappear, no more wages owed, there's evidence implicating a competitor...
attributes.name: Cruise Jr.

attributes.content: Wouldn't that be rather convenient for the higher ups?
attributes.name: Cruise Jr.

attributes.content: No worries, you're talking to a super experienced Catastrophe Messenger here! I'll find a way to get you home.
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: Listen, Cruise. I've got a plan, but I need your help.
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: The guards still think you're out cold, so you're the best man for the job.
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: W-What is it? I'll do whatever I can.
attributes.name: Cruise Jr.

attributes.content: Do you remember the way in?
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: I'll create a diversion while you go back the way we came.
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: Wait for Ayers at the entrance. He'll help you get out of here.
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: And... give him this.
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: Your clothes? There's blood on them... are you hurt?
attributes.name: Cruise Jr.

attributes.content: Just a little scratch.
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: Pass on a message, too.
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: 'Stay away, Ayers. Forget the contract. Leave this to me.'
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: Honestly, I find it hard to picture those words coming out of your mouth.
attributes.name: Honeyberry

attributes.content: Hey, I got all the miners out safely! I'm not all talk, I've got the receipts!
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: So, about the explosion...
attributes.name: Honeyberry

attributes.content: Heh, now that was my genius plan!
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: I overheard the guards say that Cowell kidnapped me because his Catastrophe Messenger died in an accident.
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: He was really anxious to claim that mine... but the only person in the area who knew about the Catastrophe's movements was me, employed by Maize Drill.
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: So he knew nothing about the Catastrophe situation. And I happened to be a Catastrophe Messenger. The rest, as they say, is history.
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: Huh? So you led him into a Catastrophe area?
attributes.name: Honeyberry

attributes.content: What? No! I would never! I'm a professional too, I've got standards!
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: I see...
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: You were the sole authority on Catastrophes present. So you faked one?
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: H-Hey, how did you guess my genius plan?!
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: But how do you fake a Catastrophe?
attributes.name: Honeyberry

attributes.content: The explosion. Leonhardt used Originium Arts to cause explosions, then told Cowell that the tremors were caused by a Catastrophe.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Exactly! I was observing the rock formations in the mine while surveying, in order to identify locations where I could create an explosion without compromising the structural stability. And...
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: There was one more important point.
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: ...What was it?
attributes.name: Honeyberry

attributes.content: The explosives.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Ah...
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Now this is getting a little interesting.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Cowell may not have felt threatened by the aftershocks of a Catastrophe on their own. He knew, however, that there were explosives set up all around the mine.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: B-But what about the workers? Weren't they scared? Didn't they want to flee with you?
attributes.name: Honeyberry

attributes.content: The lives of Rim Billiton's miners are threatened by much more than a mere Catastrophe.
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: Compared to becoming chips... or rather, expendable fodder in the competition between mining companies...
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Staying behind was the better option.
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: Now I understand... I suppose that's one way to 'rescue' them.
attributes.name: Honeyberry

attributes.content: Yup, the miners would be safe, as long as Cowell and his men were gone from the mine.
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: Cowell thought he could hold them hostage as long as he still had the detonation button.
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: Little did he know that I had already defused the explosives!
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: W-What's going on?
attributes.name: Tired Miner

attributes.content: Is it a Catastrophe? Leonhardt?
attributes.name: Tired Miner

attributes.content: No, I did it.
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: Look at Cowell's men panic.
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: I'm guessing they'll be looking for me to take them somewhere safe.
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: But a commotion like that...
attributes.name: Tired Miner

attributes.content: Trust me. I need you guys to help out too.
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: Once Cowell's men take me away, gather the others and make sure they don't leave this area.
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: Tell them it's part of the Catastrophe Messenger's plans.
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: Catastrophe Messenger! The boss is looking for you.
attributes.name: Mine Guard

attributes.content: See? What did I tell you?
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: Move it! Now!
attributes.name: Mine Guard

attributes.content: Leoâ€”
attributes.name: Tired Miner

attributes.content: Leonhardt!
attributes.name: Tired Miner

attributes.content: Hm? What is it?
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: We'll see each other again, won't we?
attributes.name: Tired Miner

attributes.content: Of course!
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: We'll see each other again, safe and sound!
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: And so the brave Catastrophe Messenger lured the villains away from the shelter he had prepared for the miners, and stood alone, steadfast, against Cowell's terrifying fangs...
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: Alone?
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: ...The brave Catastrophe Messenger, and his trusty bodyguard.
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: The guards would've beat you to a pulp if I hadn't arrived when I did.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Come on, I could've dealt with a few grunts on my own.
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: Now, I'll grant you that things wouldn't have gone so well if that bodyguard of Cowell's was around... Indeed, they could've gone very, very badly for me...
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: Yup.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Zzz....
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Zzz....
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Zzz....
attributes.name: Honeyberry

attributes.content: Hey, they've all fallen asleep!
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: Ha.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Don't laugh!
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: I was wondering why you sat here listening to me, when you've already heard the story a dozen times.
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: Now I get it.
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: You were waiting to laugh at me!
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: The story is different each time you tell it. I've lost track of how many embellishments you've made.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: You're depicting Cowell as an evil but stupid comedic villain, in order to give the impression that you're making a noble sacrifice.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Well, I can't exactly get into the gory details, can I?
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: It's enough that they know he's a really, really bad guy, right?
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: Yup.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: No matter which version you tell, though, it always ends with me saving the day.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Feeling a little verbose today, aren't you, Ayers?
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: Leon.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: It's okay to make someone worry.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: There are some things you don't need to hide.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Hehe...
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: Incidentally, Cowell's obituary appeared in the papers not long after that incident.
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: At first, I was pissed that he got away, but I guess karma caught up to him in the end.
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: So, Ayers.
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Do you REALLY not know anything about how Cowell died?
attributes.name: Leonhardt
